title: issue_clustering v2: Generate automatic split suggestions for overly broad clusters

sections.text: Add a post-clustering job that flags clusters as “too broad” using cohesion/dispersion metrics (e.g., intra-cluster similarity, size thresholds, topic entropy) and produces candidate sub-cluster splits. Persist split suggestions with the metrics and representative examples (top conversations/issues per proposed child cluster) so triage can review without re-running clustering. Expose the suggestions via an internal API/record so they can be surfaced in the triage UI and linked to downstream engineering work.
